IOLog FunctionIOLogDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSint IOLog(const char * format, ...); Parameters formatA printf() style format string (see printf(3) documentation).

# IOLog | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IOLog ](/documentation/driverkit/iolog)

-  IOLog 

Function# IOLog

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
int IOLog(const char * format, ...);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iolog#parameters)

`format`A printf() style format string (see printf(3) documentation).

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iolog#discussion)

Log a message to console in text mode, and os_log.

This function allows a driver to log diagnostic information to the screen during verbose boots, and to os_log.
